title: New UI
content: So this app was finally completed and the style.css file for this was written using perplexity as writing simple standard css can take a lot of time.
author: Nightfury1711

title: Create button to Navigation
content: A user should always be able to add a blog even when s/he's reading others blog or when s/he is checking out the available blogs therefore a create button was added directly to the navigation bar for convenience.
author: Nightfury1711
